Config.SelectMode.Name: Selection Mode
Config.SelectMode.Description: Change the fill mode when selecting tiles to ignore
Config.ReviveDeadCrops.Name: Revive Dead Crops
Config.ReviveDeadCrops.Description: Let's the fairy select dead crops to revive, revived crops will also be fully grown
Config.ResetOnSeasonChange.Name: Reset On Season Change
Config.ResetOnSeasonChange.Description: Reset all selected tiles when the season changes
Config.ToggleButton.Name: Toggle Button
Config.ToggleButton.Description: The button to press to toggle the selection overlay
